testcase.name: Preferred_Payment_Method
testcase.system-out: Given Login to the WebClient................................................passed When User Provides the valid Admin credentials..............................passed Then The User should be successfully logged into the Application............passed Then User clicks on Configuration...........................................passed Then The User should be navigated to configuration screen successfully......passed Then User navigates to the 'LOV' tab & selects the LOV type as 'User'.......passed And User verifies when the Set Code for the LOV is entered as 'PPM' then the Set Name is displayed as 'Preferred Payment Method'..passed Then User clicks on the set code 'PPM'......................................passed And User verifies the following values are defined under the new LOV - Cash, Cheque, MMP, EFT.passed

testcase.name: Verify_Preferred_Payment_Method
testcase.system-out: Then User clicks on the Data Entry & selects any available customer where Customer type = Outlet & navigates to the profile tab.passed Then User navigates to the 'Trading Terms' section..........................passed And User verifies the dropdown field named 'Preferred Payment Mode' is displayed.passed Then User selects the Collection Type as 'Cash' & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following values as 'Cash' & 'MMP'.passed Then User selects the Collection Type as 'Cheque' only & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following value as 'Cheque'.passed Then User selects the Collection Type as 'Cash & Cheque' & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following values as 'Cash', 'Cheque' & 'MMP'.passed Then User selects the Collection Type as 'Deferred Cheque' & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following values as 'Cash', 'Cheque', 'MMP' & 'EFT'..passed
